skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in crafting dynamic, interactive web experiences using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React. Through seamless API integration, I infuse vitality into my projects, enriching them with real-time data sourced from databases.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: My expertise includes fetching and rendering database data onto web pages. I've implemented dynamic sorting capabilities, optimizing user interaction with database-driven content.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.description: I've dedicated myself to crafting immersive and interactive mobile gaming applications in Android Studio. By leveraging the power of Kotlin and XML, I am able to create engaging experiences for Android devices.

skills.title: Data Analysis
skills.description: I am a Google-certified Data Analytics professional with over two years of experience harnessing SQL, Python, and PowerQuery to drive data-driven decision-making. I have extensive experience creating visualizations in Tableau to communicate insights with stakeholders.

portfolio.title: Data Analysis
portfolio.description: This project entails leveraging SQL Server Management Studio for the analysis of sales data, employing RFM analysis techniques to gain insights into the vehicle sales industry. Subsequently, Tableau is utilized for visualizations to facilitate a comprehensive understanding of the data.

portfolio.title: Web Development
portfolio.description: This website allows users to get basic brewery information from the database Open Brewery DB. When a user first loads the site the first 50 Brewerys from the database are loaded and displayed on the lefthand side of the screen. The user has the ability to click on any brewery in the list to populate all the information about the brewery.

portfolio.title: Mobile Development
portfolio.description: Event-driven memory game project made with XML and Kotlin in Android Studio. Users are able to interact with the application by selecting and matching the corresponding cards.

testimonial.description: Hamzah is awesome and an asset to any development team.
This kid is extremely talented and has a bright future ahead of him.
Hamzah is a great developer and a pleasure to work with. He is always willing to go the extra mile to get the job done.
